advancements.shape-shifter-curse.on_end_: 所以它不是永久的。很高兴知道那个
我的理论是..黄金的魔力具有强大的稳定性
advancements.shape-shifter-curse.on_get_: 尝试靠近散发着咒文的生物，并获取它们所施加的效果
advancements.shape-shifter-curse.on_slee: 在咒文效果生效的过程中去睡一觉。又能出什么问题呢？
advancements.shape-shifter-curse.on_tran: 所以，这就是你体内的魔法会产生的作用..
它不会在这一阶段停下
你目前的形态被改变的如此彻底，已经无法逆转了…是吗？
另一种截然不同的魔力
嗯…我感觉我还是喜欢我现在的样子
advancements.shape-shifter-curse.on_trig: 当不同颜色的月亮升起时，你感觉体内的魔法与之发生了共鸣..
你恢复了之前的形态..至少在月之魔力消退之前。也许你应该抓住这次机会
item.shape-shifter-curse.book_of_shape_s: 'The secrets of this book will only be revealed to shape shifters'
screen.shape-shifter-curse.book_of_shape: 当你试图翻开这本书时，你感觉到伴随着一阵微弱的刺痛，从书中溢出的奇特魔法从指尖流进了你的身体，让你如同触电一般将手缩了回去
不过你可以确信的是继续打开这本书会导致一些

screen.shape-shifter-curse.book_of_shape.text:
注意：
这会开启幻形者诅咒的模组内容
这并不算是一个适合所有人的模组，在继续前，请确保你了解其主题与玩法

screen.shape-shifter-curse.book_of_shape: Open the book of the shape shifter
info.shape-shifter-curse.on_enable_mod: 随着书页的开启，书中封印的强大魔法涌入了你的身体！
info.shape-shifter-curse.on_enable_mod_a:
回过神时，你发现自己...似乎没什么变化？
也许你应该检查一下书中的内容..
info.shape-shifter-curse.before_cursed_m: You feel that the magic in your body is surging. The next night, the cursed moon will rise...
info.shape-shifter-curse.on_cursed_moon: The magic in your body has begun to surge. The cursed moon has risen
info.shape-shifter-curse.on_cursed_moon_: Tonight's moon looks a bit strange, with some blue flowers you've never seen before appearing in the moonlight...
info.shape-shifter-curse.end_cursed_moon: The influence of the cursed moon has faded. The magic in your body tends to calm down, allowing you to return to the state before the cursed moon
The influence of the cursed moon has faded. However, due to the power of gold, your current form has stabilized
info.shape-shifter-curse.origin_form_sle: In your sleep, the curse you received has intensified the magic in your body, causing your body to change...
info.shape-shifter-curse.origin_form_tim: The curse you received gradually faded, and the magic in your body returned to calm
info.shape-shifter-curse.origin_form_use: The power of gold has calmed the magic in your body for a moment, but it quickly returned to 'normal'. To truly dispel it, you may need to find another way...
info.shape-shifter-curse.transformed_by_: The power of gold has successfully reversed your transformation! Although only a part of it...
info.shape-shifter-curse.max_form_used_c: The power of gold has no effect on your current form... It seems that only some more
may be able to reverse it
info.shape-shifter-curse.origin_form_use:
Disappointingly, the magic in your body returned to 'normal' after calming down for a moment. 
It seems that the power of gold is not enough to completely dispel the curse's influence on you...
info.shape-shifter-curse.transformed_by_: The powerful power of gold has almost completely reversed your transformation! But you can still feel the dormant magic in your body, waiting for the next opportunity...
info.shape-shifter-curse.max_form_used_c: It worked! The more powerful power of gold has successfully reversed a part of the changes in your body
info.shape-shifter-curse.origin_form_use: Affected by the catalyst, the magic in your body is a bit restless, but it eventually calms down. It seems that they lack a more clear direction...?
The effects of the curse you received have been activated by the catalyst, causing your body to change...
info.shape-shifter-curse.transformed_by_: Affected by the catalyst, the magic in your body has further changed you...
info.shape-shifter-curse.max_form_used_c:
Your current form has been changed so thoroughly that even the catalyst is difficult to produce further effects..
(Don't be disappointed, I may add what you're thinking of in the mod later!)
codex.status.infected: For some reason, you suddenly feel a strange

, and you feel that the magic in your body is changing
Maybe you should
codex.status.before_moon: You feel that the magic in your body is surging, and the next night, the cursed moon will rise...
codex.status.under_moon:
The influence of the cursed moon has changed your body...
As the night ends, this influence will also fade. But... maybe you should take advantage of this opportunity?
codex.desc.appearance_normal: Your body feels no different from usual. Perhaps the magic in your body needs some kind of trigger to take effect?
codex.desc.pros_normal: Currently, the magic in your body has not brought you any perceivable benefits
codex.desc.cons_normal: Currently, the magic in your body has not brought you any disadvantages
codex.desc.instincts_normal:
Examine your heart, you do perceive some kind of magic in your body, but that's all.
Your heart is calm, maintaining a perception of the surrounding environment
codex.desc.appearance_0: Due to the resonance of the magic in your body with other creatures, your body has undergone some changes. At this stage, a golden apple is enough to completely reverse it...
codex.desc.pros_0: Your new form gives you some additional abilities...
codex.desc.cons_0: At the same time, your new form also brings some inconveniences...
codex.desc.instincts_0:
Instincts from other creatures invade your heart
If you insist on resisting them, the unstable magic in your body may further change your body...
codex.desc.appearance_1:
The intensified magic has further changed your body. You perceive that it is trying to reach a new equilibrium, a state that is completely different from your original self.
Perhaps it is a good idea to reverse it with a golden apple before it enters the next stage...
codex.desc.pros_1: Your new form gives you more additional abilities...
codex.desc.cons_1: At the same time, your new form also brings some new inconveniences...
codex.desc.instincts_1:
The influence of the instincts of other creatures in your heart is becoming more and more obvious
If you insist on resisting them, the unstable magic in your body may further change your body...
codex.desc.appearance_2: The magic in your body has almost completely changed you. It has reached a new stable state, and even a golden apple is of no avail...
codex.desc.cons_2: At the same time, your form also has some inconvenient places...
codex.desc.instincts_2: Your instincts no longer bother you, they have become a part of you
codex.form.original.title: Overall, in the eyes of others, you are a completely normal human
codex.form.bat0.title: Overall, if you manage to hide the anomalies on your body, others will think you are a bit of a strange human
codex.form.bat0.appearance:
Your arms extend membranous appendages on the outside, feeling a bit like a bat
Your coccyx also protrudes outward to form a small tail
But other than that, they seem to have little practical function
codex.form.bat0.pros: When in the dark, you feel more agile in your actions
codex.form.bat0.cons: You can no longer wear chest armor: your new appendages make them ill-fitting.
codex.form.bat0.instincts: Stay in the dark makes you feel
The idea of eating fruit makes you feel
The idea of being surrounded by dripping stones or stalactites makes you feel
The idea of staying in the sun makes you feel
codex.form.bat1.title: Overall, others might think you belong to an alien race.
codex.form.bat1.appearance:
Your ears are now located on top of your head, large and pointed, facing forward.
The membrane-covered appendages on your arms have grown longer. When you jump, you find yourself involuntarily flapping them.
Your fingers have become claw-like, making fine manipulations difficult. However, you can still grasp items normally.
Your toes have elongated and spread outward.
Your tail has grown significantly longer.
You seem to have shrunk in size slightly.
codex.form.bat1.pros:
You can now clearly distinguish objects in the dark.
Your arms have become stronger, enhancing your melee attack power.
Though still unable to fly, flapping your membranes allows you to jump higher.
Your body now absorbs non-meat foods more efficiently, they provide more satiety.
When in shadowed areas, you feel more agile and swift.
codex.form.bat1.cons:
Your finger structure now makes using bows or crossbows nearly impossible.
The membranes and new toe structure prevent wearing chest armor or shoes.
In sunlight, you feel weaker and slower.
Your body no longer efficiently digests meat; they provide less satiety.
codex.form.bat1.instincts: The thought of staying in the dark makes you feel
The idea of eating some fruit makes you feel
The thought of being surrounded by dripstone or stalagmites makes you feel
The idea of staying in sunlight makes you feel
The thought of eating meat makes you feel
The idea of sleeping and wasting a beautiful night makes you feel
codex.form.bat2.title: Overall, others would see you as a large, strange bat.
codex.form.bat2.appearance:
Your ears now dominate your head, allowing detection of the faintest sounds.
Your face has developed into a short muzzle with sharp small teeth visible.
Your arms have become part of the membrane. While still too heavy for flight, they suffice for controlled descents and dives.
Your forelimbs are no longer suited for heave tool or weapon use.
New claws, digitigrade legs, and a balancing tail make you well-suited for diving and gliding. You can still run with effort.
In cold caves, your fur helps maintain warmth.
codex.form.bat2.pros:
You can distinguish objects in darkness. In shadowed areas, you feel more agile and swift.
Your forelimbs are hard and strong, allowing significant unarmed damage. They also enable fast blockbreaking and harvesting of ores normally.
Though still unable to fly, flapping membranes allows higher jumps and controlled descents from any height; they can function as elytra too.
Your body now absorbs non-meat foods more efficiently, they provide more satiety.
You are now small enough to fit through one-block spaces; though larger than other similar creatures.
codex.form.bat2.cons:
Your forelimbs cannot grip heavy tools or weapons; using them on hard blocks or attacking causes them to slip off.
Using using bows or crossbows is impossible with your current claw structure.
The membrane and digitigrade legs prevent wearing chestplate, leggings, or boots. They also slightly slow ground movement.
Sunlight weakens and slows you considerably.
You can no longer eat meat; your body cannot digest it.
